title: Galway United » David Hurley
snippet: He was United’s top scorer in 2023 with 21 league goals, helping secure the First Division title. His standout performances earned him Player of the Year and a place in the PFAI Team of the Year. Hurley re-signed for 2025, continuing as a vital part of the squad.

title: David Hurley (footballer) - Wikipedia
snippet: He scored in a 1–1 draw away to Bohemians at Dalymount Park in the final game of the season as his side finished in 5th place in their first year back in the top flight. Hurley signed up for a 5th season with the club on 30 November 2024. On 20 June 2025, he scored from his own half in a 3–1 win over St Patrick's Athletic with goalkeeper Joseph Anang's clearance falling straight to Hurley while 40 yards out of his goal.
